attributes.action: More medical assistance to the people through this pandemic (Covid-19)
attributes.additional_details: As it is a human right to have access to health care, this is should not be overlooked or neglected by the Government along with the NHS. Also the continuation of testing for Covid-19 should be allowed as it can decrease the spread of the virus, in comparison to the alternative approach that is being taken now of not doing so.
attributes.background: To provide more medical assistance to people who are sick, take seriously their symptoms, provide more medication as well as check ups. While in those 7 days a person self isolates and is very sick it can be lethal without any medical support.

rejection.details:
The medical treatment of patients in the UK is a clinical matter for the NHS and the National Institute for Health and Care Excellence (NICE), not the UK Government.

You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a related action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/301354.

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:  

www.gov.uk/coronavirus 
https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips 

You can also read impartial analysis of the Government response to coronavirus and policy developments here:
https://commonslibrary.parliament.uk/coronavirus/
